changes.text: Complete Polling & Voting System: Backend API, Admin UI with 4-step wizard, Email link voting (no auth required), Dashboard integration, Project/Budget vote creation, Spanish translation support

Sprint Cleanup-1: UI consistency across all 9 views, centralized logger utility, 850+ console statements converted to log levels, ActionBar positioning standardized, sticky headers, modal aesthetics, dashboard backdrop fix
Year-end close no longer double-converts centavos (100x inflation bug fixed before AVII June 2026 deadline)
